data.title: Signature Models
data.text:
Jaco Pastorius

Fender Signature Bass Guitars are where it all originated from and then one step further with Specific Artist Additions to each model.. Leo Fender gave us all the info we need for the Electric Bass Guitar.. The Fender P Bass with its Single pick-up configuration Was used by such notables as James Jamerson, Duck Dunn and Steve Harris and is the most recorded bass in history. The Fender Jazz Bass made popular by Jaco Pastorius , Geddy Lee, Mel Schacher .Shop Bass Central For Fender Basses and Bass Guitars, In Stock and made to order and buy with confidence including careful inspection, testing and packing with fully insured shipping with every Bass Guitar

Widely regarded as the world's greatest electric bass player, Jaco Pastorius redefined the voice of the instrument and the role of the bassist, merging the worlds of R&B, rock, jazz, classical and Caribbean music and reshaping the musical landscape with his dazzling playing and visionary approach. And he did it all with a Jazz Bass. His unmistakable voice and signature sound came from his mind, his heart, his hands and his sunburst fretless Jazz Bass, recreated here with unmistakable look, tone and feel as the Jaco Pastorius Jazz Bass.
